parameters: \C[3]There are human-shaped figures sitting in the chairs.
there's so many things I don't understand.
\.The weirdest part was that we even found a
gun and some bullets in this room.
\.It makes me wonder what exactly the kidnappers wanted
us to do with this kind of weapon...
\.My guess is they want us to start butting heads...
\.If someone had access to a weapon that gave them an
advantage over others... who knows if they’d be
willing to hand that over to someone else?
\.\C[4](A fight over the weapon... Yeah, that is plausible.)
\.Thankfully for all of us, we have little Miss Sara
holding onto it. So, we won’t be falling for that trap.
\....Why do you put so much faith in me?
\.\C[4](...Keiji's been intentionally guiding everyone to put
I didn’t think you’d look so perplexed.
I found these dummy bullets in the cafeteria.
\.Could they be a clue of some kind?
\C[3]Now... What to do while he's investigating?
\.\C[3]Before leaving the room, I turned around, and...
Huh? Uh, Miss Sara, aren’t you coming?
\.\C[3]Iron bars appeared over the door, separating me from
I... I-I-I’ll go find something that can pry it open!!
\.Well, this took a turn for the worse.
\.Sara! Y-You didn’t get hurt, did you?
No tellin’ what’ll happen... keep yer guard up!
\.Woah, woah! Easy now... No need to get so worked up.
\.\sw[99]So! To get the ball rolling here,
I’ll give a quick breakdown of the rules
Are you telling me you wanna bet your life without
a quick huddle up? The hell are you on?\sw[100]
\.\sw[99]Aaah don’t worry about it, it’s child’s play!
So, first off... there’s \C[2]five people\C[0] in the room
\.\sw[99]Well, come on gang! If you take a look around,
\.\sw[99]One of you will be the challenger...
and the rest of you four will get nice and comfy and
get ready for some target practice!\sw[100]
\.Targets?! And what the hell’re we gonna be targets
I gave you guys that cool weapon over there,
\.Y-YOU WANT US TO SIT OUR ASSES DOWN AND BE
There’s gotta be a way to get through this without any
\.\sw[99]Hahahah... Well, duh! Do you know how boring it
would be just watching you all sit down and get your
brains blown out? Gotta spice it up a little bit...
\.\sw[99]So! First order of business... We have to \C[2]decide which
one of you the challenger’s gonna be\C[0]...\sw[100]
\.You outta yer mind?! You want us to pick a challenger
without knowin’ the damn rules first?! Who the hell
d'you think's gonna offer up to get blown to pieces?!
\.\sw[99]Oui Monsieur!~ The only ones experiencing the life of
the party are the targets! ...I know, real bummer...\sw[100]
\.Sara... can I ask you to be the challenger?
No way in hell yer callin' the shots here, kid!!
\.It would be rude to force such a young lady
to handle a firearm under these conditions...
\.Mr. Policeman is with Joe on this one.
Sara’s got a good head on her shoulders.
\.Well, Sara? Are you confident about this?
\.\C[4](In that trial, he did what I counted on him to do...)
\.\C[4](Now, he's making a request of me...!)
\.\C[4](In that trial, he did what I counted on him to do...)
\.\C[4](Now, he's making a request of me...!)
\.\C[4](I can't possibly tell him I'm not confident!!)
\.Nah... Nuh-uh! No way I’m agreein’ to this!
\.S’not like I don’t trust ya, kid.
\.It seems... that’s the appropriate course of action
in order to handle this situation.
and then hold a majority vote?
\.Okie-dokie. Just let me know when you’re ready.
This place is suspicious as hell, I tell you what...
\.Just gettin’ a feel for the place.
nook and cranny of this room from head to toe...
Speakin’ of... not seein’ any cameras, neither.
What’s up with this huge painting?
\.M-Maybe try taking it off of the wall...
\.Eh, let’s start small and work our way up...
\.Besides, Sara... looks like it may be a
little out of your reach, yeah? Heheh...
\.For your information, I grew a centimeter taller last
\.T-That’s fine! Just... don’t outgrow me, okay?
\.Aw... don’t worry! You’ll just be my armrest...
Ahaha. I’m glad you remembered my name!
Listen, keep an eye out on Sara for me, would ya?
\.I’m just trying my best not to drag her down...
So, I followed your advice and tried taking the
\.Unfortunately, the thing won’t budge an inch.
Hey, Sara. Hold out your hand.
\.Probably. Dangerous stuff... So, would you mind?
\.Joe will get\fi antsy\fi if I keep ‘em...
\.That said, can’t hand ‘em over to him, either.
\.So... I’m counting on you for this one, Sara.
Alright... time for Mr. Policeman to get back to work.
\.Keep up the good work, you two.
It would appear to be a doll.
\.It looks like it was placed there for a reason...
\.The head has some weight to it...
I can make out a sloshing sound inside.
\.Hm... Perhaps the kidnappers intended for us to stick a
straw in their heads. In the event one of us becomes
the head seems pretty firm to the touch.
I was attempting to make a joke... but...
\C[3]There are human-shaped figures sitting in the chairs.
\C[3]Something strange is sitting in the chair.
\.Let’s take it off the chair and check it out.
\.Hm? The doll is attached to the chair.
\.I feel like there’s a reason for this...
\.Hm... It could be dangerous to touch it so carelessly.
L-Let’s... look at it for now.
\.\C[3]It appeared to be affixed to the chair, made so that
\.I feel like there’s a reason for this...
I wouldn’t know what I’d do if the doll suddenly
\.\C[3]Taking a closer look, there's something between the
\....What are you going to do with that gun, Sara?
\.Hey... \|\|Why don’t you let me hold on to that?
How bold of you... handing a gun over to a
\.Or, are you relieved that there are no bullets?
\.Sorry, but, You should hold onto this, Miss Sara.
Don’t hand over things like this so carelessly next
\.But, I’m happy to see that you trust me! Heheh.
\.Ahaha... You’re right! Best not to let something so
...But, definitely don’t give this to anyone else.
\C[3]A dubious doll sits in the chair.
\C[3]A dubious doll sits in the chair.
\.Let’s take it off the chair and check it out.
\.Hm? The doll is attached to the chair.
\.I feel like there’s a reason for this...
\.Hm... It could be dangerous to touch it so carelessly.

\.I feel like there’s a reason for this...

\.Let’s take it off the chair and check it out.
\.Hm? The doll is attached to the chair.
\.I feel like there’s a reason for this.
\.It could be dangerous to touch it so carelessly.
Let’s look at it for now.
\.\C[3]It appeared to be affixed to the chair, made so that
\.I feel like there’s a reason for this.
\.Well, it’s probably for the best. I wouldn’t know what
I’d do if the doll suddenly attacked me!

A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.

\.\C[3]Could probably combine this with another item.

in the center of the Revolver.
Can I fire the dart with this now?)

with these, it'll only make a sound.
Can be loaded into a gun and fired. Extremely lethal.
